summary: Their women having been enslaved by the local pack of lesbian vampires thanks to an ancient curse, the remaining menfolk of a rural town send two hapless young lads out onto the moors as a sacrifice.
cast: Silvia Colloca|Margarita Hall|Sianad Gregory|Mathew Horne|Lucy Gaskell|Emma Clifford|James Corden|Travis Oliver|Susie Amy|MyAnna Buring|Louise Dylan|Ashley Mulheron|Tiffany Mulheron|John Pierce Jones|Steve Clark-Hall|Paul McGann|Emer Kenny|Vera Graziadei|Jessica Powell|Mary Liddell|Michelle Carter|Nellie McQuinn|Kimberley Payne|Stacy Franklin|Kelly Franklin|Suzanne Perkins|Rossana Stocchino|Lucy Emes|Josephine McGrail|Sirle Von Schihver|Natalie Totham|Ani James|Terrence Stone|Paul Warren
title: Lesbian Vampire Killers
